Issue.creator: btl5037
Issue.summary: Fabric uses a third-party Docker client, should be replaced with official Docker client
Issue.description: Fabric currently uses the fsouza, 3rd party Docker client. At the time of vendoring, this was the mainstream Docker client for Go. There is now an official Docker Client for Go, and the fsouza repo now states you should use this moving forward, as the fsouza client will no longer guarantee support for Docker updates.
